original_title: Adventures in Space with Scott McCloud
overview: The adventures of law enforcer Scott McCloud, the one-man Marine Corps for the Earth Bureau of Investigation.  Working in utmost secrecy, Scott McCloud takes assignments involving the security of our solar system.  The video contains three segments: "Power Failure," "The Went Thatta Way" and "Scratch One Chimp."
title: Adventures in Space with Scott McCloud
